title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, May 15, 2020
description: Emily Dickinson died in Amherst, Massachusetts, on this date in 1886 at the age of 56. The first volume of her poems was published 4 years later.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Emily Dickinson died in Amherst, Massachusetts, on this date in 1886 at the age of 56. The first volume of her poems was published 4 years later.
